definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Reuben (Moab) Ked(a)mwq, Kadhmwq, etc.; Jos 13:18, [[מוֹת]]- Jos 21:37, 1Ch 6:64; hence [[מִדְבַּר קְדֵמוֹת]] De 2:26 of contiguous desert;—´[[ק]]: lay N. of upper Arnon; not identified; Buhl:George. 268 conj. Umm-er-raṣâṣ, c. 10 m. ENE. from Dibon (cf. Tristr:Moab 140ff. Bd:Pal. 3 (1898), 177).
